name: Service
friendlyName: Deploy a DACPAC on remote server
description: Deploy a DACPAC on remote server
author: Comerco

inputs.name: DacpacPath
inputs.label: Dacpac Path
inputs.helpMarkDown:
The path of the DACPAC.
Eg : C:\DAC Packages\MyApplication.dacpac

inputs.name: DacfxPath
inputs.label: Dacfx Path
inputs.helpMarkDown:
The path of the DacFX dll.
Eg : C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft SQL Server\130\Tools\Binn\ManagementStudio\Extensions\Application\Microsoft.SqlServer.Dac.dll

inputs.name: ProfilePath
inputs.label: DacProfile Path
inputs.helpMarkDown:
The path of the DacProfile.
Eg : $(MSBuildExtensionsPath)\MyApp\dev.publish.xml

inputs.name: AdminUserName
inputs.label: Login
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Administrator login for the target machine.
Eg: domain\username

inputs.name: AdminPassword
inputs.label: Password
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Password for administrator login for the target machine.
It can accept variable defined in Build/Release definitions as '$(passwordVariable)'.
You may mark variable type as 'secret' to secure it.

inputs.name: MachineName
inputs.label: Machine name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the machine where the schedule task is running.
